title: Wisconsin Firm Recalls Ground Beef Products Due to Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, January 15, 2013 — Glenn's Market and Catering, a Watertown, WI establishment, is recalling approximately 2,532 pounds of raw ground beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The...
impacted_products: Various size packages of Glenn's Market ground round, ground chuck and ground beef sold between Dec. 22, 2012 and Jan. 4, 2013.
